posts.title: Bloody Nose Soda
posts.content: Quench your thirst in vampire-like fashion by gulping down a bottle of some refreshing Bloody Nose soda. Despite the somewhat off-putting and very graphic label, this bright red soda features a fruity cherry flavor that will surprise and delight.

posts.title: Digital Sketch Pen
posts.content: The digital sketch pen lets you combine your innate artistic ability with your Photoshop skills in order to create works of art capable of rivaling those of the great Michelangelo or Da Vinci. Now any sketch or idea will be able to be refined through the magic of photo editing.

posts.title: Sony V71 High Power Audio System
posts.content: The Sony V71 high power audio system will get the party started and keep it going all night long. This Bluetooth enabled device allows you to take full control of the party with a built-in mic input, cool DJ effects, and a 360° party light for an authentic nightclub experience.

posts.title: Color Changing Drumsticks
posts.content: Make your epic drum solo the highlight of the entire set by rocking out with these color changing drumsticks. These heavy duty drumsticks are designed to take a beating and are embedded with motion activated LEDs that create amazing visual effects when you play.

posts.title: Flip Top Convertible Bench/Table
posts.content: Get the most out of your patio furniture by bringing this flip top convertible bench/table into your backyard. The clever design of this all-weather piece allows you to easily transform it from a comfy bench to a sturdy picnic table.

posts.title: Female Urination Funnel
posts.content: Achieve true gender equality by peeing while standing up with this female urination funnel. Simply place the plastic pink funnel by your hoo-ha and watch as you break gender barriers as you perform the glorious act of urinating while standing.

posts.title: Coin Stealing Piggy Bank
posts.content: Make saving more appealing than ever by storing your loose change inside this coin stealing piggy bank. Each time you place a coin over the designated space, an adorable little white kitty pops out of the box and grabs your coin using his small paw.

posts.title: Spider Mouse
posts.content: Encase a real spider in a clear acrylic mouse and watch as your computer or laptop quickly becomes the least used PC at your home or office. Available in multiple arachnoid and insect styles, these real spider mouses are ideal for arachnoid lovers.

posts.title: Lighter Watch
posts.content: Rid yourself of those pesky arm hairs around your wrist when you begin rocking the lighter watch. This fully functional and flashy timepiece incorporates a useful butane lighter into the watch’s face so you always have a light when you need it.

posts.title: Electric Stun Gun Ring
posts.content: Keep yourself protected while walking through the mean streets by toting around this electric stun gun ring. This discreet weapon fits easily in the palm of your hand so you can quickly use it to deter a would-be attacker from doing you harm.

posts.title: Coffee Brewing Pipe
posts.content: The Bripe coffee brewing pipe is the must-have accessory for any caffeine addict who loves the great outdoors. This ultra portable copper pipe allows you to easily whip up a savory cup of Joe, espresso, or tea in less than three minutes.

posts.title: Light Switch Cover Labels
posts.content: Make your home more user-friendly by installing these light switch cover labels. These handy glow in the dark domed emblems feature an adhesive backing for easy application in addition to universal iconography so that you can know which switch is which.
